I will try to make it simple for you. DEI was created to stop inequality, when several people are of equal experience and qualifications, everyone is given the same chance at the job. No thanks Granny! Do you even know what DEI means or who benefits from these policies? Diversity, equity and inclusion practices ensure merit hiring by making sure historically underrepresented groups have an equal shot at employment. The primary group to benefit from DEI is white women, followed by disabled people and military veterans. DEI in no way sets quotas for minority hiring or lowers qualifications. Companies with DEI policies are more innovative, profitable, have less employee turnover, and have less lawsuits.

I managed a DEI program for a fortune 100 company and it has absolutely nothing to do with being “woke“ and it is nothing new. These policies have been around for decades to counteract systemic bias that prevents merit hiring. Companies with DEI programs are more innovative, profitable, have less employee turnover, and significantly less lawsuits.
